question1.title: What is Latin Hack?
question1.answer: Latin Hack is a Latin American hackathon that takes place in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

question2.title: Where can I participate?
question2.answer: Remotely from anywhere in LATAM. Presencial sedes 1 day in AR/BR/CO/MX.

question3.title: How can I register?
question3.answer: By creating your account (CTA on the page) and joining the Discord.

question4.title: What are the prizes?
question4.answer: 15.000 USDT + mentorship 6 weeks + travel grants to Sub0 Buenos Aires + all-expenses-paid trip to Miami to see the GOAT

question5.title: What is the language of the workshops?

question7.title: Can I participate alone?
question7.answer: Yes, but you will need to join a team.

topic1.title: What is Web3?
topic1.description: In this workshop we explain what Web3 really is (no fluff), how the Polkadot ecosystem works, and why it’s key for Latin Hack. You’ll leave with a clear foundation and the tools to get a head start at the hackathon.
